## Graph.hasNode() method

Determines if the graph contains a node by id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasNode(id: NodeId): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | [NodeId](./workflow.nodeid.md) | The node id |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
